body:
Comment 1: 
The URL shows the URL as provided in the Request-Line (see the RFC).
The Host and Scheme are typically gleaned from other parts of the
request, as you've found.  But not always.  If this is a proxy request
then the URL will be more complete.

The library is showing you the truth, not a papered over version of
the truth.
_Owner changed to **r...@golang.org**._ _Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
